profile:
Our Clients are #1 priority so we truly believe in high business ethics as far as relations with our clients are concerned. We strongly intend to develop a closer trust based on a long-term business relationship with our clients. Equally important to us is that our quality of products delivered matches the quality of our service. Our furniture is well maintained and spotless. If an item in our collection is damaged, ripped, broken or stainedâ€¦ it does NOT leave our showroom.
When you team up with Stagers Choice, you get more than a catalog of fine furniture, you get a team of professionals willing to go beyond to help you with your project and make your experience with us efficient & profitable.

We have flexible prices & lease terms and delivery all over GTA is available within 24 hours.

profile:
INSPIRATIONAL LIVING is a leading Toronto Real Estate Staging Company specializing in the enhancement of properties for sale. 
We are a professionals in interior design and home staging, determined to transform your home to get you the biggest return on your investment. Our mission is to inspire potential home buyers to fall in love with your property by envisioning themselves living there! 
Services are offered throughout Southern Ontario including the following: Greater Toronto Area, York Region (Markham, Richmond Hill, Vaughan, Thornhill, Aurora, Newmarket), Peel Region (Brampton, Mississauga), Durham Region (Ajax, Pickering, Whitby, Oshawa, Stouffville, Uxbridge),

profile: Archic Design Studo is home staging company catering to clients who are looking for a marketing edge to stand out against the competition in selling their vacant or occupied home or apartment to discriminating buyers in the Toronto and York Region. Our focus is working with home sellers and their real estate agents to prepare their property to appeal to the largest potential audience and sell as quickly as possible.As Certified Advanced Stagers we transform a property into a buyer's must-have through the use of targeted lifestyle marketing techniques and advanced staging methods to make a space appear brighter, larger and more desirable. Regardless of our client's budget or time frame, we can develop a home staging plan that is right for them.
